body:
## Upgrade to non-blocking Hyper 0.12

Thanks to @audunhalland from the PR

* Make pact_mock_server_cli use ServerManager (Audun Halland)
* Rename API function again (Audun Halland)
* feat: Add a parameter for the server key to the start command #26 
* feat: Add a command to shut the master mock server down #26 
* fix: global options no longer incorrectly display a warning about being provided twice #27 
* fix: Only print errors in the CLI to STDERR #28 
* chore: added docker release scripts for the CLIs 
* fix: corrected the docker build for the mock server cli #14 
* fix: CLI was reporting incorrect pact specification version
name: Pact Mock Server Standalone v0.5.0
